title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Bern, Switzerland
description:
very happy to inform you that this year a second swiss location opened for the legendary GLOBAL DAY OF CODE RETREAT (http://globalday.coderetreat.org/). we invite coders from all over the world to have a day of fun in bern. 
hurry up to register (https://willcome.to/shGRz1). seats are limited so don't hesitate!
